${ModID}:HuntingStrike.NAME: Hunting Strike
${ModID}:HuntingStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals double damage to elites and bosses。

${ModID}:Focus.NAME: Track
${ModID}:Focus.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Hunted

${ModID}:PerfectDodge.NAME: Perfect Dodge
${ModID}:PerfectDodge.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If your 格挡 is broken exactly 本回合, 获得 !M! 点 力量 。

${ModID}:Greatsword.NAME: Greatsword
${ModID}:Greatsword.DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If you have unspent energy at the end of the turn, increase this card's damage by 8 for each until played。

${ModID}:HuntingInstincts.NAME: Hunter's Instincts
${ModID}:HuntingInstincts.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得s double 格挡 if facing an elite or boss。

${ModID}:SkullClub.NAME: Skull Club
${ModID}:SkullClub.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If the target survives, become ${ModID}:Enraged! NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:CoreBlaster.NAME: Core Blaster
${ModID}:CoreBlaster.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add a *Core *Blinder to your 抽牌堆。 NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:CoreBlaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add a *Core *Blinder+ to your 抽牌堆。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:CoreBlinder.NAME: Core Blinder
${ModID}:CoreBlinder.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL Add a *Core *Blaster to your 抽牌堆。 NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:CoreBlinder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Add a *Core *Blaster+ to your 抽牌堆。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:GuardianShield.NAME: Guardian Shield
${ModID}:GuardianShield.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 格挡 回合结束时. NL 每当 you are attacked, deal !M! damage back。

${ModID}:InfernoDaggers.NAME: Inferno Daggers
${ModID}:InfernoDaggers.DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害 !M! times and set this card's cost to 6. NL When Retained, reduce this card's cost by 1。
${ModID}:InfernoDaggers.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 保留 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害 !M! times and set this card's cost to 6. NL When Retained, reduce this card's cost by 1。

${ModID}:StabManual.NAME: Stabbing Manual
${ModID}:StabManual.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Add !M! *Shivs to your hand. Increase the number of *Shivs this adds by 1 for the rest of combat。

${ModID}:SlimeHammer.NAME: Slime Hammer
${ModID}:SlimeHammer.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 at the end of the next turn。
${ModID}:SlimeHammer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 给予1层 虚弱. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害 at the end of the next turn。

${ModID}:SlaverWhip.NAME: Slaver's Whip
${ModID}:SlaverWhip.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL If this kills an enemy, add it back to your hand and it costs 0 本回合。

${ModID}:GremlinLance.NAME: Gremlin Lance
${ModID}:GremlinLance.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If this kills an enemy, 获得 [E] and 抽一张牌。

${ModID}:ChampMail.NAME: Champion's Platemail
${ModID}:ChampMail.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If you are at 50% Health or below, remove all your debuffs and 获得 !M! 点 力量 。 NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:ChampMail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If you are at 50% Health or below, remove all your debuffs and 获得 !M! 点 力量 。

${ModID}:CursedBow.NAME: Cursed Bow
${ModID}:CursedBow.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:HyperBlaster.NAME: Hyper Blaster
${ModID}:HyperBlaster.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Shuffle !M! Voids into your 抽牌堆。

${ModID}:EphemeralShroud.NAME: Ephemeral Shroud
${ModID}:EphemeralShroud.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Intangible. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:StoneHelm.NAME: Stone Helm
${ModID}:StoneHelm.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 Reduced by 2 for every card you've played 本回合. NL End your turn。

${ModID}:TimepieceTiara.NAME: Timepiece Tiara
${ModID}:TimepieceTiara.DESCRIPTION: 获得 3 力量 every 12 cards you play。
${ModID}:TimepieceTiara.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 获得 3 力量 every 12 cards you play。

${ModID}:CarvingKnife.NAME: Carving Knife
${ModID}:CarvingKnife.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 If this kills an Elite or Boss enemy, 获得 its weapon or armor card. NL Fleeting。

${ModID}:AwakenedRitualDagger.NAME: Awakened Dagger
${ModID}:AwakenedRitualDagger.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 If Fatal, Heal to full 生命。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:HuntingContract.NAME: Hunting Contract
${ModID}:HuntingContract.DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Hunted. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:HunterRank.NAME: Hunter Rank
${ModID}:HunterRank.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! 点 力量 。 Increases by 1 for each Elite and Boss enemy you've defeated. NL 获得 !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity。

${ModID}:TranqBomb.NAME: Tranquilizer Bomb
${ModID}:TranqBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${ModID}:Nonlethal damage. NL Target enemy 失去s !M! 点 力量 。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Paintball.NAME: Paintball
${ModID}:Paintball.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Hunted. NL Retain !${ModID}:m2! card 本回合。
${ModID}:Paintball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Hunted. NL Retain !${ModID}:m2! cards 本回合。
